channel.title: GlaciusPvP ~ Pking perfection
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=4]Hello moparscape! I don't know how to make a thread look apealling so bear with me here.[/SIZE]
GlaciusPvP is a cool pking server with some unique features. Many features are added or updated daily. All suggestions made will be reviewed. We currently have a low bugdet so we cannot get a better website. But we have a 2GB VPS hosting 24/7 and we will upgrade it as the server grows.
URL links:
[ul][*]Download client: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/5p1s492ut518k3q/GlaciusPvPClient.zip]https://www.dropbox.com/s/5p1s492ut518k3q/GlaciusPvPClient.zip[/url] [*]Temporary website: [url=https://www.glaciuspvp.webs.com]https://www.glaciuspvp.webs.com[/url][/ul]
[/CENTER]
[SIZE=6][CENTER][U][B]Features:[/B][/U][/CENTER][/SIZE]
[CENTER] Perfect pking. Upgradeable items in 317. Killstreak with rewards + a special shop. Completionist cape. Train skills + PK to get this awesome cape. Perfect reward shops. To get a focus point and don't get bored. Wilderness wide PVMing. Kill bosses in the wilderness to get items that are/aren't buyable from the stores. Perfect duel arena with dds/whip (fun weapons)! Not pay to win!
[U][B]Misc:[/B][/U] Click to change status. Clean quest tab with information. Gear tab for free gear. Proper nex effects. 317 loading 508 maps, 602 items, 525 monsters, 508 interfaces.
Join now and enjoy the PKing!
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ic7hip.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/nxtauw.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2uhxs92.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2n9giev.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]PvMing in the wilderness! (More bosses added daily, just need a good place to add it).[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/a88p3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2rx8842.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/hs5pn6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2eb8s2s.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[COLOR="#F0FFFF"][SIZE=3]P.S. As i said theres nothing much special. The server is pretty fun trust me and join now![/SIZE][/COLOR]

item.title: GlaciusPvP ~ Pking perfection
item.dc:creator: @Dave_is_pro Dave is pro
item.description:
@Dave_is_pro wrote:

Looks like a sweet server man but i dont really like 508’s

Many features are added or updated daily.
